content.rendered:
Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu

29/07/2022

 

Check out our new brand partners!

 

Get cash bonus (or cashback) when you shop with our latest brand partners and let your cashback get invested automatically!

Shop with our latest brands and get your cash bonus invested into your Raiz account.

How? Just go to “Raiz Rewards” in your app, search for your favourite brand, and click the “Shop Online Here”. We’ll direct you to our brand partner’s app or website. Shop like normal, and you will be on your way to get your cashback.*

So, as you shop, you invest!

 

*Terms & Conditions apply.

 

The Economist

(+up to 7% invested)

The Economist is an authoritative global news and analysis. The Economist offers fair-minded, fact-checked coverage of world politics, economics, business, science, culture and more.

Shop online now with The Economist through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get up to 7% of your subscription amount invested back into your Raiz account.

 

Omio

(+up to 3.5% invested)

Omio brings together more than 1,000 transportation providers across trains, buses, flights, ferries, cars, and airport transfers to make it easier for you to focus on what really matters.

Book online now with Omio through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get up to 3.5% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

 

Oppo

(+up to 2.1% invested)

Explore the latest innovative Oppo smartphones and accessories and leap into the future with Oppo latest smartphone model.

Shop online now with Oppo through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get up to 2.1% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

 

*All promotions are subjected to terms & conditions set by the brand partners.

 

Need more details?

Read the FAQ on Raiz Rewards here

 

Want to earn MORE rewards on top of your Raiz Rewards?

For each friend that you refer who starts investing with Raiz, Raiz will give you a referral bonus of RM10. Plus, your friend also gets an RM10 bonus! Refer your friends now!

 

 

Want to use Raiz Rewards but don’t have the Raiz App?

Download it for free in the App store or the Webapp here.

 

Important Information

The information on this website is general advice only. This means it does not consider any person’s investment objectives, financial situation, or investment needs. If you are an investor, you should consult your licensed adviser before acting on any information contained in this article to fully understand the benefits and risks associated with the Raiz product.

The information on this website is confidential. It must not be reproduced, distributed, or disclosed to any other person. The information is based on assumptions or market conditions that change without notice. This will impact the accuracy of the information.

Under no circumstances is the information to be used by, or presented to, a person for the purposes of deciding about investing in Raiz.

22/07/2022

 

Top up game points and get cash bonus!

 

Get cash bonus (or cashback) when you shop with our gaming brand partners and let your cashback get invested automatically!

Now is the perfect time to purchase your game points and be on top of the leader board! Purchase your game points at CodaShop & Razer Gold and use Shopee Pay on this Payday Sale on 25 July 2022 to get upsized cash bonus with Raiz Rewards.


Shop for your game points now and get your cash bonus invested into your Raiz account.

Just go to “Raiz Rewards” in your app, search for your favourite brand, and click the “Shop Online Here”. We’ll direct you to our brand partner’s app or website. Shop like normal, and you will be on your way to get your cashback.

So, as you shop, you invest!

 

*Terms & Conditions apply.

 

 

Codashop

(+Up to 0.49% invested)

Get RM4 discount when you buy points for Genesis Crystals and Blessing of the Welkin Moon (Genshin Impact) with ShopeePay with a minimum spend of RM50 from 1-31 July 2022.

Shop online now with Codashop through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get up to 0.49% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

 

SEAGM

(+0.49% invested)

Top up your PUBG Mobile UC using SEAGM to get a chance to win Limited Edition GB Bear Toys and 10,000 credit from SEAGM, * on top of earning cash bonus from Raiz Rewards.

Shop online now with SEAGM through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get 0.49% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

* Terms & conditions apply.

 

Razer Gold

(+1.4% invested)

Get 10% rebate (up to RM3) when you reload or recharge a minimum of RM30 (from 8 – 31 July 2022) on your favorite games into your Razer Gold Malaysia Wallet using ShopeePay. On top of that, stand a chance to win a ticket for ESL One Malaysia 2022.

Shop online now with Razer Gold through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get 1.4% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

 

*All promotions are subjected to terms & conditions set by the brand partners.

 

Need more details?

Read the FAQ on Raiz Rewards here

 

Want to earn MORE rewards on top of your Raiz Rewards?

For each friend that you refer who starts investing with Raiz, Raiz will give you a referral bonus of RM10. Plus, your friend also gets an RM10 bonus! Refer your friends now!

 

 

Want to use Raiz Rewards but don’t have the Raiz App?

Download it for free in the App store or the Webapp here.

 

Important Information

The information on this website is general advice only. This means it does not consider any person’s investment objectives, financial situation, or investment needs. If you are an investor, you should consult your licensed adviser before acting on any information contained in this article to fully understand the benefits and risks associated with the Raiz product.

22/07/2022 

 

Beli ‘game points’ dan dapatkan bonus tunai!

 

Dapatkan bonus tunai (atau cashback) apabila anda berbelanja dengan rakan jenama kami. Bonus tunai ini kemudiannya akan dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda secara automatik!

Sekarang adalah masa yang terbaik untuk anda mendapatkan ‘game points’ ! Beli ‘game points’ dengan CodaShop & Razer Gold menggunakaan ShopeePay pada Jualan Hari Gaji pada 25 Julai 2022 untuk mendapatkan bonus tunai tambahan dengan Raiz Rewards.

Beli ‘game points’ anda sekarang dan dapatkan bonus tunai yang akan dilaburkan ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

Pergi ke “Raiz Rewards” di dalam aplikasi Raiz, pergi ke jenama kegemaran anda, dan klik “Shop Online Here”. Kami akan membawa anda ke aplikasi/ lawan web rakan jenama kami. Berbelanjalah seperti biasa, dan anda akan dalam perjalanan untuk menerima bonus tunai.

Jadi, sambil anda berbelanja, anda melabur!

 

*Tertakluk pada terma & syarat.

 

CodaShop

(+ sehingga 0.49% akan dilaburkan)

Dapatkan diskaun RM4 apabila anda membeli ‘game points’ untuk Genesis Crystals dan Blessing of the Welkin Moon (Genshin Impact) dengan ShopeePay apabila anda membuat perbelanjaan minima sebanyak RM50 dari 1-31 Julai 2022.

Beli dalam talian sekarang dengan Codashop melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat sehingga 0.49% daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

 

SEAGM

(+0.49% akan dilaburkan)

Tambah nilai PUBG Mobile UC anda menggunakan SEAGM untuk mendapatkan peluang memenangi Mainan Beruang GB Edisi Terhad dan 10,000 kredit dari SEAGM selain mendapat bonus tunai daripada Raiz Rewards.

Beli dalam talian sekarang dengan SEAGM melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat 0.49% daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

*Tertakluk pada terma & syarat

 

Razer Gold

(+ 1.4% akan dilaburkan)

Dapatkan rebat 10% (terhad sehingga RM3) apabila anda tambah nilai atau mengecas semula game kegemaran anda ke dalam Razer Gold Wallet Malaysia anda menggunakan ShopeePay pada 8-31 Julai 2022 (minimum RM30). Selain itu anda berpeluang untuk memenangi tiket ESL One Malaysia 2022.

Beli dalam talian sekarang dengan Razer Gold melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat 1.4% daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

 

* Semua promosi tertakluk kepada terma & syarat yang ditetapkan oleh jenama yang terbabit.

 

Ingin tahu lebih lanjut?

Baca Soalan Lazim di sini

 

Ingin dapatkan ganjaran yang LEBIH selain daripada Raiz Rewards?

Bagi setiap rakan yang anda rujuk untuk melabur dengan Raiz, kami akan memberikan anda ganjaran bonus RM10. Rakan anda juga akan mendapat ganjaran RM10! Jemput rakan anda sekarang!

 

Ingin menggunakan Raiz Rewards tetapi tiada aplikasi Raiz?

Muat turun dengan percuma di ‘App store’ atau ‘Webapp’ menggunakan pautan di sini:

title: Raiz Rewards: Lebih banyak jenama untuk anda!

content.rendered:
Click here for English

15/07/2022 

 

Lihat jenama terkini

 

Dapatkan bonus tunai apabila anda berbelanja dengan rakan jenama kami, dan bonus tunai anda akan dilaburkan secara automatik!

Memperkenalkan 6 rakan jenama baru kami di Raiz Rewards! Belikan kek buat yang tersayang dengan CakeRush, dapatkan pakaian dalam dengan Triumph, dapatkan VPN anda di NordVPN, beli produk penjagaan kesihatan dengan Total Image, dapatkan makanan tambahan anda di Hiramino, dan beli barangan melalui laman web membeli-belah domestik dalam talian terbesar di China, Taobao!

Berbelanja dalam talian dengan rakan jenama kami melalui Raiz Rewards untuk menerima bonus tunai yang akan dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda. *

Hanya klik pada “Shop Online Here” melalui Raiz Rewards, dan kami akan membawa anda ke aplikasi/ laman web rakan jenama kami. Berbelanja seperti biasa, dan anda akan dalam perjalanan untuk menerima bonus tunai.

Jadi, sambil anda membeli, anda melabur!

*Tertakluk pada terma & syarat.

Jenama Terbaru

 

CakeRush

(+4.2% akan dilaburkan)

Buat penghantaran kek pada hari yang sama di kawasan Lembah Klang, Pulau Pinang, Ipoh dan Johor Bahru melalui Cake Rush. Kualiti adalah dijamin dengan pembuat kek yang berpengelaman.

Tempah dalam talian sekarang dengan CakeRush melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat 4.2%daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

 

Triumph

(+7% akan dilaburkan)

Triumph Malaysia menawarkan pelbagai jenis pakaian dalam yang selesa dan bergaya untuk wanita semua peringkat umur. Beli pakaian dalaman keluaran terbaru dalam talian sekarang!

Tempah dalam talian sekarang dengan Triumph melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat 7% daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

 

NordVPN

(+ 28% akan dilaburkan)

NordVPN ialah VPN terbaik untuk anda yang mementingkan keselamatan apabila menggunakan Wi-Fi di tempat awam dan memerlukan sambungan yang lebih privasi.

Tempah dalam talian sekarang dengan NordVPN melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat 28% daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

 

Total Image

(+ 3.92% % akan dilaburkan)

Total Image menyediakan produk makanan tambahan berkualiti tinggi, selamat & berkesan selama lebih daripada 20 tahun.

Tempah dalam talian sekarang dengan Total Image melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat 3.92% daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

 

Hiramino

(+ 5.88% % akan dilaburkan)

Hiramino komited untuk membekalkan produk kesihatan yang berkualiti tinggi.

Tempah dalam talian sekarang dengan Hiramino melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat 88% daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

 

Taobao

(+ sehingga 25% % akan dilaburkan)

Taobao ialah laman web membeli-belah domestik dalam talian yang terbesar di China yang menawarkan pelbagai jenis barangan pada harga yang rendah.

Tempah dalam talian sekarang dengan Taobao melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat sehingga 25% daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

 

* Semua promosi tertakluk kepada terma & syarat yang ditetapkan oleh jenama yang terbabit.

 

Ingin tahu lebih lanjut?

Baca Soalan Lazim di sini

 

Ingin dapatkan ganjaran yang LEBIH selain daripada Raiz Rewards?

Bagi setiap rakan yang anda rujuk untuk melabur dengan Raiz, kami akan memberikan anda ganjaran bonus RM10. Rakan anda juga akan mendapat ganjaran RM10! Jemput rakan anda sekarang!

 

Ingin menggunakan Raiz Rewards tetapi tiada aplikasi Raiz?

Muat turun dengan percuma di ‘App store’ atau ‘Webapp’ menggunakan pautan di sini:

title: Raiz Rewards: More brands for you!

content.rendered:
Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu

15/07/2022

 

Check out our new released brands

 

Earn cash bonus when you shop with our brand partners and let your cash bonus get invested automatically!

Welcoming 6 of our new brand partners on Raiz Rewards! Get cakes for your special ones with CakeRush, buy your best lingerie at Triumph, get your VPN at NordVPN, buy beauty and health supplements from Total Image, manage your health better with supplements from Hiramino, and check out China’s biggest domestic online shopping website, Taobao!

Shop online with our brand partners via Raiz Rewards and earn cash bonus of your purchase invested back into your Raiz account. *

Just click the “Shop Online Here” button via Raiz Rewards and we’ll direct you to our brand partner’s app or website. Shop like normal, and you will be on your way to get your cash bonus.

So, as you shop, you invest!

*Terms & Conditions apply.

 

New Brands

 

CakeRush

(+4.2% invested)

CakeRush is your reliable choice for same-day cake delivery in Klang Valley, Penang, Ipoh and Johor Bahru. Quality is guaranteed through their local bakers with decades of experience.

Shop online now with CakeRush through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get 4.2% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

 

Triumph

(+7% invested)

Triumph Malaysia offers a wide range of comfortable and fashionable bras and panties for women of all ages. Shop new arrivals online!

Shop online now with Triumph through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get 7% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

 

NordVPN

(+28% invested)

NordVPN is the best VPN if you’re looking for peace of mind when on public Wi-Fi and private connection internet.

Shop online now with NordVPN through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get 28% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

 

Total Image

(+3.92% invested)

Total Image has been providing top-quality, safe & effective supplements for more than 20 years.

Shop online now with Total Image through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get 3.92% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

 

Hiramino

(+5.88% invested)

Hiramino is committed to promoting health and wellness by supplying customers with high-quality supplements.

Shop online now with Hiramino through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get 5.88% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

 

Taobao

(+up to 25% invested)

Taobao is China’s biggest domestic online shopping website that offers all kinds of products at incredibly low prices.

Shop online now with Taobao through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get up to 25% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

 

*All promotions are subjected to terms & conditions set by the brand partners.

 

Need more details?

Read the FAQ on Raiz Rewards here

 

Want to earn MORE rewards on top of your Raiz Rewards?

For each friend that you refer who starts investing with Raiz, Raiz will give you a referral bonus of RM10. Plus, your friend also gets an RM10 bonus! Refer your friends now!

 

 

Want to use Raiz Rewards but don’t have the Raiz App?

Download it for free in the App store or the Webapp here.

 

Important Information

The information on this website is general advice only. This means it does not consider any person’s investment objectives, financial situation, or investment needs. If you are an investor, you should consult your licensed adviser before acting on any information contained in this article to fully understand the benefits and risks associated with the Raiz product.

title: Raiz Rewards: Lebih banyak jenama pelancongan & promosi terkini!

content.rendered:
Click here for English

01/07/2022 

 

Tawaran Minggu Ini

 

Dapatkan ganjaran apabila anda berbelanja dengan rakan jenama kami, dan ganjaran anda akan dilaburkan secara automatik!

Memperkenalkan 4 rakan jenama baru kami di Raiz Rewards! Dapatkan tawaran eksklusif dengan Hilton Honors, beli pas perjalanan dengan Go City, beli koleksi pakaian terbaru Kenzo, dan lihat produk penjagaan kesihatan dengan Omron.

Berbelanja dalam talian dengan rakan jenama kami melalui Raiz Rewards untuk menerima ganjaran tunai yang akan dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.*

Hanya klik pada “Shop Online Here” melalui Raiz Rewards, dan kami akan membawa anda ke aplikasi/ lawan web rakan jenama kami. Berbelanja seperti biasa, dan anda akan dalam perjalanan untuk menerima ganjaran tunai.

Jadi, sambil anda membeli, anda melabur!

*Tertakluk pada terma & syarat.

 

Jenama Baru

 

Hilton Honors

(+ 1.75% akan dilaburkan)

Hilton Honors menawarkan banyak cara untuk memperoleh dan menggunakan mata ganjaran setiap hari, mengikut cara anda. Tempah hotel, dapatkan ganjaran, rancang perjalanan anda, dan pelbagai lagi.

Tempah dalam talian sekarang dengan Hilton Honors melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat 1.75% daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

 

Omron

(+ 4.9% akan dilaburkan)

Omron mereka dan menyediakan peralatan kesihatan untuk kegunaan rumah dan perubatan serta perkhidmatan kesihatan.

Beli dalam talian sekarang dengan Omron melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat 4.9% daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

 

Go City 

(+ 3.5% akan dilaburkan)

Go City adalah perniagaan pas pelancongan terbesar di dunia. Terokai tempat dan tarikan pelancongan menarik, semuanya dalam satu pas.

Beli dalam talian sekarang dengan Go City melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat 3.5% daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

 

Kenzo

(+ 2.45% akan dilaburkan)

Kenzo ialah fesyen mewah yang berasal Perancis, dan ianya terkenal dengan pengaruh dari Asia di dalam gaya tradisional Eropahnya.

Beli dalam talian sekarang dengan Kenzo melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat 2.45% daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

 

Promosi Terkini

Shopee

(+ sehingga 6.37% akan dilaburkan)

Beli dalam talian sekarang dengan Shopee melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat sehingga 6.37% daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

Promosi Istimewa: Jualan Pertengahan Tahun Shopee 7.7 (dari sekarang hingga 7 Julai)

  • Penghantaran percuma dengan perbelanjaan minima RM7
  • Pengguna Shopee boleh mengumpul ‘golden ticket’ setiap hari melalui permainan ‘Spin & Win BMW X1’ pada aplikasi Shopee. Lebih banyak ‘golden ticket’ yang dikumpul pengguna, lebih tinggi peluang untuk memenangi hadiah.
  • Dapatkan baucar 77% ‘coins’ dengan perbelanjaan minimum RM0 (dihadkan pada 300 ‘coins’).

 

 

* Semua promosi tertakluk kepada terma & syarat yang ditetapkan oleh jenama yang terbabit.

 

Ingin tahu lebih lanjut?

Baca Soalan Lazim di sini

 

Ingin dapatkan ganjaran yang LEBIH selain daripada Raiz Rewards?

Bagi setiap rakan yang anda rujuk untuk melabur dengan Raiz, kami akan memberikan anda ganjaran bonus RM10. Rakan anda juga akan mendapat ganjaran RM10! Jemput rakan anda sekarang!

 

Ingin menggunakan Raiz Rewards tetapi tiada aplikasi Raiz?

title: Raiz Rewards: More travel brands & promotions!

content.rendered:
Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu

01/07/2022

 

Your weekly deals

 

Earn rewards when you shop with our brand partners, and let your rewards get invested automatically!

Welcoming 4 of our new brand partners on Raiz Rewards! Get exclusive perks with Hilton Honors, buy travel passes with Go City, shop the latest wear by Kenzo, and check out Omron’s healthcare products to take charge of your health.

Shop online with our brand partners via Raiz Rewards and earn a percentage of your purchase invested back into your Raiz account. *

Just click the “Shop Online Here” button via Raiz Rewards and we’ll direct you to our brand partner’s app or website. Shop like normal, and you will be on your way to get rewarded.

So, as you shop, you invest!

*Terms & Conditions apply.

 

New Brands

Hilton Honors

(+ 1.75% invested)

Swipe, ride, drive, dine, and fly your way to fabulous rewards. Hilton Honors offers lots of ways to earn and use points every day, your way. Book a hotel, earn rewards, plan your trip, and so much more.

Book online now with Hilton Honors through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get 1.75% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

 

Omron

(+0.49% invested)

Omron develops and manufactures health equipment for home and medical use, health management software, and health promotion services.

Book online now with Omron through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get 4.9% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

 

Go City

(+3.5% invested)

Go City are the world’s largest sightseeing pass business. Discover the best attractions, tours, and experiences, all on one pass.

Book online now with Go City Travel Pass through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get 3.5% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

 

Kenzo

(+2.45% invested)

Kenzo is a French luxury fashion house that is known for its Asian influence on traditional European styles.

Shop online now with Kenzo through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get 2.45% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

 

Promotions

Shopee

(+up to 6.37% invested)

Shop online now with Shopee through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get up to 6.37% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

Special Promotion: Shopee’s 7.7 Mid-Year Sale (from now until 7 July)

  • Free shipping with a minimum spend of RM7
  • Shopee users can collect golden tickets daily through the “Spin & Win BMW X1” game in Shopee App. The more golden tickets users collect, the higher the chance of winning the prize.
  • Get 77% coins cashback voucher with RM0 minimum spend capped at 300 Coins.

 

*All promotions are subjected to terms & conditions set by the brand partners.

 

Need more details?

Read the FAQ on Raiz Rewards here

 

Want to earn MORE rewards on top of your Raiz Rewards?

For each friend that you refer who starts investing with Raiz, Raiz will give you a referral bonus of RM10. Plus, your friend also gets an RM10 bonus! Refer your friends now!

 

Want to use Raiz Rewards but don’t have the Raiz App?

Download it for free in the App store or the Webapp here.

 

Important Information

title: “Should I withdraw all my money now?” Investing – from our POV 👀

content.rendered:
Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu

A Raizer called today. She asked – politely – “I have made an RM1,000 one-off deposit early this year. To date, my account balance is now RM939. That is -6.1% already. Why is it lower? What should I do? Should I withdraw all my money now? This is my first time investing using my money. Please help.”.

 

Why is it lower?

In investing, there are ups and downs. When you invest, you practically buy units of shares at a price.

The price goes up and down according to share market movement.

 

Now let’s look at the share market performance.

US market (S&P 500 index) is down 21.1% since January this year.

At home, our market (FBM KLCI) is down 8.7% year-to-date.

As you can see, the customer’s investment is down 6.1% — this is still technically better than the market performance. Why? Because with Raiz, you don’t invest in a single share. You invest in a portfolio of shares in many markets globally. So, when one share goes down, another goes up, it is eventually balanced out. This is the importance of diversification.

 

So, what should the customer do, and should she withdraw all her money?

What she is seeing is just a loss on paper – it is not realized until you act upon it. If you withdraw, you practically sell all your units. If you sell at a lower price than you bought, you make a loss. If you sell it higher, you make a profit. Buy low, sell high. So instead of telling her whether or not to withdraw, we told her to take the opportunity of the current low price. Buy more units so your average cost per unit gets lower so when the market bounces back, you will be back in the green faster. This is actually ringgit cost averaging.

Remember, every market downturn in the past has ended up higher. A market downturn is an opportunity. Don’t get carried away with emotions.

Raiz is designed for 1st-time investors. We help build your investment portfolio, we let you invest using a small amount of money, and we automate your investing process so you can invest regularly. These are all key to having a healthier balance in the long run.

Happy investing!

 

Don’t have the Raiz App? 

Download it for free in the App store: 

 

 

 

Important Information 

The information on this website is general advice only. This means it does not consider any person’s investment objectives, financial situation or investment needs. If you are an investor, you should consult your licensed adviser before acting on any information contained in this article to fully understand the benefits and risk associated with the Raiz product. 

The information on this website is confidential. It must not be reproduced, distributed or disclosed to any other person. The information is based on assumptions or market conditions which change without notice. This will impact the accuracy of the information. 

Under no circumstances is the information to be used by, or presented to, a person for the purposes of deciding about investing in Raiz.

title: Raiz Rewards: Perhatian kepada gamers! Jenama ini khas untuk anda.

content.rendered:
Click here for English

24/06/2022 

 

Jenama baru & promosi terkini

 

Adakah anda tahu kini anda boleh membeli mata Valorant dan dapatkan ganjaran serta melabur pada masa yang sama? Betul, memang boleh! Jom lihat rakan jenama baru kami di Raiz Rewards – Razer Gold & SEAGM!

Berbelanja dalam talian dengan rakan jenama kami melalui Raiz Rewards untuk menerima ganjaran tunai yang akan dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda. *

Hanya klik pada “Shop Online Here” melalui Raiz Rewards, dan anda akan dalam perjalanan untuk menerima ganjaran tunai yang akan dilaburkan kembali ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

Jadi, sambil anda membeli, anda melabur!

*Tertakluk pada terma & syarat.

 

Jenama Baru

Razer Gold

(+ 1.4% akan dilaburkan)

Razer Gold ialah kredit dalam talian yang terkenal untuk ‘gamers’ di seluruh dunia. Dengan lebih 28 juta pengguna berdaftar, pengguna boleh membeli dan menggunakan Razer Gold dengan mudah untuk lebih daripada 42,000 jenis permainan dalam talian.

Beli dalam talian sekarang dengan Razer Gold melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat 1.4% daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

 

SEAGM

(+ sehingga 0.49% akan dilaburkan)

SEAGM adalah platform barangan digital global yang menyediakan tambah nilai  bagi permainan mudah alih, kod prabayar digital, kad hadiah dan banyak lagi.

Beli dalam talian sekarang dengan SEAGM melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat 0.49% daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

 

 

Promosi Terkini

Shopee

(+ sehingga 6.37% akan dilaburkan)

Beli dalam talian sekarang dengan Shopee melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat sehingga 6.37% daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

Promosi Istimewa: Jualan hari gaji

  • Gunakan kod kupon SHP25ST dan dapatkan potongan sebanyak RM20 dengan perbelanjaan minimum RM23 (hanya untuk pengguna baru Shopee)
  • Gunakan kod kupon IA25PK dan dapatkan 15% ‘Coins Cashback’ dengan perbelanjaan minimum sebanyak RM53 (terhad pada 930 ‘coins’) (hanya untuk pengguna Shopee sedia ada)

 

Al-Ikhsan Sports

(+1.96% akan dilaburkan)

Beli dalam talian sekarang dengan Al-Ikhsan Sports melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat 1.96% daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

Promosi Istimewa: Jualan Mega Pertengahan Tahun

  • Dapatkan potongan sehingga 60% (sekarang hingga 30 Jun 2022)
  • Hadiah percuma (beg, beg gym & pelitup muka) apabila anda berbelanja sebanyak RM250 (untuk pakaian terpilih sahaja dan sementara stok masih ada)

 

JD Sports

(+ sehingga 3.43% akan dilaburkan)

Beli dalam talian sekarang dengan JD Sports melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat sehingga 3.43% daripada jumlah pembelian anda yang akan dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda!

Youbeli

Beli dalam talian sekarang dengan Youbeli melalui Raiz Rewards dan anda akan mendapat 2.45% daripada jumlah pembelian anda dilaburkan semula ke dalam akaun Raiz anda.

Promosi istimewa: Hari Ahli Youbeli

  • Gunakan kod kupon MEMBER6 dan dapatkan potongan sebanyak RM6 dengan perbelanjaan minimum sebanyak RM60
  • Gunakan kod kupon MEMBER18 dan dapatkan potongan sebanyak RM18 dengan perbelanjaan minimum sebanyak RM160
  • Gunakan kod kupon FSMEMBER dan dapatkan penghantaran percuma dengan perbelanjaan minimum sebanyak RM40 (harga penghantaran dihadkan pada RM4.80)
* Semua promosi tertakluk kepada terma & syarat yang ditetapkan oleh jenama yang terbabit.

 

Ingin tahu lebih lanjut?

Baca Soalan Lazim di sini

 

Ingin dapatkan ganjaran yang LEBIH selain daripada Raiz Rewards?

Bagi setiap rakan yang anda rujuk untuk melabur dengan Raiz, kami akan memberikan anda ganjaran bonus RM20. Rakan anda juga akan mendapat ganjaran RM20! Jemput rakan anda sekarang!

 

 

Ingin menggunakan Raiz Rewards tetapi tiada aplikasi Raiz?

title: Raiz Rewards: Attention, gamers! This is for you.

content.rendered:
Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu

24/06/2022

 

New brand partners & ongoing promotions

 

Did you know that you can get your Valorant points (among many others, of course) and get rewarded and invested at the same time? Now you do! Welcoming our new brand partners on Raiz Rewards, Razer Gold & SEAGM!

Shop online with our brand partners via Raiz Rewards and earn a percentage of your purchase invested back into your Raiz account. *

Just click the “Shop Online Here” button via Raiz Rewards to be on your way to get the cash reward.

So, as you shop, you invest!

*Terms & Conditions apply.

 

New Brands

Razer Gold

(+ 1.4% invested)

Razer Gold is the leading virtual credit for gamers worldwide, with over 28 million registered users. With a network of close to 6 million channel touchpoints, users can easily buy and use Razer Gold in over 42,000 games and entertainment titles.

Shop online now with Razer Gold through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get 1.4% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

 

SEAGM

(+0.49% invested)

SEAGM is a global digital goods platform that provides mobile games top-up, digital prepaid code for games, gift cards, and more.

Shop online now with SEAGM through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get 0.49% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

Promotions

Shopee

(+ up to 6.37% invested)

Shop Online Now with Shopee through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get up to 6.37% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

Special Promotion: June 25 Payday Sale

  • Use coupon code SHP25ST and get RM20 off with a minimum spend of RM23 (only for new Shopee customers)
  • Use coupon code IA25PK and get 15% coins cashback with a minimum spend of RM53 (capped at 930 coins) (only for existing Shopee customers)

 

Al-Ikhsan Sports

(+ 1.96% invested)

Shop online now with Al-Ikhsan Sports through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get 1.96% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

Special Promotion: Mid-Year Mega Sale

  • Enjoy up to 60% off from now until 30 June 2022.
  • Get free gifts (woven bag, gym sack bag, and face mask) when you spend a minimum of RM250 on selected apparels (while stocks last)

 

JD Sports

(+ up to 3.43% invested)

Shop online now at JD Sports through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get up to 3.43% of your purchase invested back into your Raiz account!

Special Promotion:

  • Enjoy up to 50% off from now until 10th July 2022

 

Youbeli

(+ 2.45% invested)

Shop online now with Youbeli through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get 2.45% of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

Special Promotion: Youbeli Member Day

  • Get up to 70% off on Youbeli Member Day (now until 26 June 2022)
  • Use coupon code MEMBER6 and get RM6 off with a minimum spend of RM60
  • Use coupon code MEMBER18 and get RM18 off with a minimum spend of RM160
  • Use coupon code FSMEMBER and get free shipping with a minimum spend of RM40 (capped at RM4.80)
*All promotions are subjected to terms & conditions set by the brand partners.

 

Need more details?

Read the FAQ on Raiz Rewards here

 

Want to earn MORE rewards on top of your Raiz Rewards?

For each friend that you refer who starts investing with Raiz, Raiz will give you a referral bonus of RM20. Plus, your friend also gets an RM20 bonus! Refer your friends now!

 

 

Want to use Raiz Rewards but don’t have the Raiz App?

Download it for free in the App store or the Webapp here.
